title: Dolby.io Virtual Worlds Plugin
description: The Dolby.io Virtual Worlds Plugin provides Dolby-quality spatial chat in virtual world environments while drastically increasing the number of people you can hear in a shared audio scene.
longDescription:
For Unreal Engine 4.27 and 5.x


The Dolby.io Virtual Worlds Plug-In enables full-featured video and voice chat that can support massive scale. Server-side spatial mixing drives social interactions between hundreds of players.

 

Where traditional communications solutions prioritize the three loudest (N-Loudest) voices, Dolby.io revolutionizes virtual world interaction by enabling developers to build unforgettable events that support hundreds of active speakers through spatially mixing audio on our server.

 

For video chat, the Dolby.io plug-in supports up to 50 people in a chat in HD quality. Sharing your entire screen or just a window with other players.

 

Webinars can support an audience of over 100,000 viewers with sub-second latency.

 

Key Dolby.io Virtual World Plug-In Benefits: 

  • Windows, macOS & Linux support
  • Spatial chat between gamers, from two to hundreds in a single chat
  • HD video chat for up to 50 people
  • Audio-only chats for up to 250 people
  • Share your entire screen or an application into the virtual world
  • Full device management for setting the microphone, speakers and camera to use
  • Reduces the CPU load and bandwidth required for large scale by mixing spatially on the server and not the client
  • Automatically remove unwanted background noise between gamers by suppressing distracting sounds like barking dogs, street noise, or keyboard clicks that can break immersion
  • Automatically level microphones and both balance speaking and listening volumes for everyone within the game for improved intelligibility

 

A Dolby.io account is required to use this plugin. You can create an account at https://dashboard.dolby.io/signup
technicalDetails:
Features:

  • Spatial Chat (headphone renderer)
  • Scale, from two to hundreds of active speakers
  • Spatial mixing
  • Cloud hosted service
  • Video and audio or audio only
  • AI background noise reduction
  • Blueprints or C++
  • Cross platform, Dolby.io support a large range of compatible SDKs for different languages and platforms
  • GDPR, HIPAA, and SOC-2 compliant


Supported Target Platforms:

  • Windows 10+ x86 for UE4 & UE5
  • macOS 10.14+ x86 for UE4
  • macOS 12+ x86 & Apple Silicon for UE5
  • Ubuntu 20.04 or later for UE4 & UE5


Documentation:

  • Getting started: https://api-references.dolby.io/comms-sdk-unreal/docs/category/tutorials
  • Blueprint docs: https://api-references.dolby.io/comms-sdk-unreal/docs/category/blueprint-nodes
  • C++ docs: https://api-references.dolby.io/comms-sdk-cpp/index.html
